issue.title: Error in diffusion table binding
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

```

Warning: Illegal string offset 'perimeter' in C:\wamp2.2\vhosts\dev\administrator\components\com_easysdi_shop\tables\diffusion.php
```


Problem is that binding uses JForm for default values. Outside of edit form, the JForm array doesn't exists.
Introduced "here":https://forge.easysdi.org/projects/easysdi/repository/annotate/branches/4.3.x/joomla/easysdi/com_easysdi_shop/src/administrator/tables/diffusion.php#L38

Patch is to test existence of JForm array

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.0
